parse.title: List of libraries in Hong Kong

text.*:
This is a list of libraries in Hong Kong.

Wikimedia Commons has media related to Libraries in Hong Kong.

Contents

  • 1 Public libraries and other libraries open to the public
  • 2 University libraries
  • 3 Private libraries
  • 4 External links

Public libraries and other libraries open to the public[edit]

The Hong Kong Public Library consists of 65 libraries organised by district.
